CMH.JO.summary: Combined Motor Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the motor retail and car hire businesses in South Africa. It offers new and used vehicles, parts, and related services; and life, disability, dread disease, retrenchment, and vehicle and component warranty insurance products, as well as vehicle financing solutions. The company also operates a fleet of approximately 7,000 vehicles through First Car Rental. In addition, it is involved in the distribution and franchising business; distribution of consumables, digital marketing, and workshop equipment; and supply and installation of workshop lifting, lubrication and diagnostic equipment, and the supply of waterless car wash systems. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Umhlanga, South Africa.
